root.version_history: Version Date Author Comments 1.0 20241113 H Saini Created

sourcefolder_ispac.comments: Leave blank if not deploying ispac

ispac_sln.comments: List SSIS solutions, this is required and DONOT use *.sln. CSV is okay

ispac_filter.comments: ispac files to be copied, ex. PRJ-STG-1.ispac, PRJ-STG-2.ispac or *.ispac

sourcefolder_dacpac.comments: Leave blank if not deploying dacpac

dacpac_sln.comments: List Database solutions, this is required and DONOT use *.sln; CSV is okay

dacpac_filter.comments: dacpac files to be copied, ex. BI_Control.dacpac, BI_Log.dacpac or *.dacpac
